results.title: Slowing of mitral valve annular calcium in systemic hypertension by nifedipine and comparisons with enalapril and atenolol.
results.text_hl: M-mode echocardiography revealed @<m>DISEASE_Granuloma_Annulare</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016460 @@@MAC@@@ only in 2 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ group (2.6%), in 13 in the @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ group (18%) and in 15 in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ group (20%).

citations.NLM: Cacciapuoti F, Perrone N, Diaspro R, Galzerano D, Gentile S, Lapiello B. Slowing of mitral valve annular calcium in systemic hypertension by nifedipine and comparisons with enalapril and atenolol. Am J Cardiol. 1993 Nov 1;72(14):1038-42. PMID: 8213584
citations.BibTeX: @article{8213584, title={Slowing of mitral valve annular calcium in systemic hypertension by nifedipine and comparisons with enalapril and atenolol.}, author={Cacciapuoti F and Perrone N and Diaspro R and Galzerano D and Gentile S and Lapiello B}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={72}, number={14}, pages={1038-42}}

results.title: Pulmonary artery dissection following balloon valvuloplasty in a dog with pulmonic stenosis.
results.text_hl: After 1 month of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ therapy, a pulmonic valve balloon valvuloplasty procedure was performed, and the intra-operative right ventricular pressure was reduced by 43%.

citations.NLM: Grint KA, Kellihan HB. Pulmonary artery dissection following balloon valvuloplasty in a dog with pulmonic stenosis. J Vet Cardiol. 2017 Apr;19(2):182-189. PMID: 27913078
citations.BibTeX: @article{27913078, title={Pulmonary artery dissection following balloon valvuloplasty in a dog with pulmonic stenosis.}, author={Grint KA and Kellihan HB}, journal={J Vet Cardiol}, volume={19}, number={2}, pages={182-189}}
